details:
This package runs commands in a pre-install script that exfils sensitive data to a attacker-controlled domain.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (494e6e8145930583b08e1bd8ca2253636cbcaa48edeb20bd83d5d37974f3b9d2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bigcommerce-cornerstone' @ 6.16.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
